name: Bad Pupils and Teacher
description:
Bad pupils, bad teacher

You are a teacher and those brats won't listen. They even throw things at you! You better make sure they don't learn a thing from your class.

Erease everything written on the classroom board so they don't get a chance at school. The more you erease, the higher your score will be.

Survive

They constantly throw stuff at you! If you get hit too much, it's game over.

Controls

Use LEFT and RIGHT arrows in order to move.

Pressing DOWN arrow will make you crouch.

Get close to something written on the board and press SPACE to erease it.
